text: Chiller was an American cable and satellite television network. It was owned by NBCUniversal Cable Entertainment Group subsidiary of NBCUniversal, all owned by Comcast. It specialized in horror, thriller and suspense programming, mainly films. It launched on March 1, 2007. The channel ceased operations on December 31, 2017. Category:American television channels Category:NBCUniversal Category:2007 establishments in the United States Category:2017 disestablishments in the United States
title: Chiller (TV network)
